speakers.name: Thomas A.Edison
speakers.quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.

speakers.name: Confucius
speakers.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.

speakers.name: Lucas Grabeel
speakers.quote: The greatest thing about where my life is right now is it's very relaxed and chill. I'm just hanging out, being myself and doing my work.

speakers.name: Norman Cousins
speakers.quote: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live.

speakers.name: Denis Waitley
speakers.quote: The greatest gifts you can give your children are the roots of responsibility and the wings of independence.

speakers.name: Jim Valvano
speakers.quote: My father gave me the greatest gift anyone could give another person, he believed in me.

speakers.name: Sai Baba
speakers.quote: Love one another and help others to rise to the higher levels, simply by pouring out love. Love is infectious and the greatest healing energy.

speakers.name: Aristotle
speakers.quote: You will never do anything in this world without courage. It is the greatest quality of the mind next to honor.

speakers.name: Henry Ford
speakers.quote: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty. Anyone who keeps learning stays young. The greatest thing in life is to keep your mind young.

speakers.name: Joyce Meyer
speakers.quote: I believe that the greatest gift you can give your family and the world is a healthy you.

speakers.name: Andrew Jackson
speakers.quote: I've got big shoes to fill. This is my chance to do something. I have to seize the moment.

speakers.name: Thomas Hood
speakers.quote: Frost is the greatest artist in our clime - he paints in nature and describes in rime.

speakers.name: Abraham Lincoln
speakers.quote: America will never be destroyed from the outside. If we falter and lose our freedoms, it will be because we destroyed ourselves.

speakers.name: John Adams
speakers.quote: I must study politics and war that my sons may have liberty to study mathematics and philosophy.

speakers.name: Jimmy Carter
speakers.quote: We become not a melting pot but a beautiful mosaic. Different people, different beliefs, different yearnings, different hopes, different dreams.

speakers.name: Thomas Jefferson
speakers.quote: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.

speakers.name: Woodrow Wilson
speakers.quote: The history of liberty is a history of resistance.

speakers.name: George Washington
speakers.quote: My first wish is to see this plague of mankind, war, banished from the earth.

speakers.name: Theodore Roosevelt
speakers.quote: If you could kick the person in the pants responsible for most of your trouble, you wouldn't sit for a month.

speakers.name: Franklin Roosvelt
speakers.quote: There are many ways of going forward, but only one way of standing still.
